articles.title: Hyun Bin-Son Ye-jin love story: Unseen photos, videos from their gorgeous wedding - The Indian Express
articles.description: South Korean stars Hyun Bin and Son Ye-jin tied the knot on Thursday. Here's looking at their love story from colleagues to friends and to finally lovers.
articles.content: For the Bin-jin fans, it’s a joyous occasion, as South Korean stars Hyun Bin and Son Ye-jin, known for their popular drama, Crash Landing On You (CLOY), tied the knot on Thursday in a dreamy ceremony… [+2860 chars]
